oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1953-11-28 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from November 28, 1953, 8:30 pm. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Webb Pierce (host, performer), Hank Locklin (performer, first appearance), Minnie Pearl (performer), Tommy Jackson (performer), Lew Childre (performer), Anita Kerr (performer), the Old Hickory Singers (performers), Rod Brasfield (performer), and Stringbean (performer). Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/626
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Old Hickory Singers; Rod Brasfield; Hank Locklin; Stringbean; Webb Pierce
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Webb Pierce) -- Prince Albert jingle (Old Hickory Singers) -- Jubilee (Old Hickory Singers) -- Webb Pierce introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Webb Pierce) -- Webb Pierce introduces Hank Locklin -- Lessons In Love (Hank Locklin) -- Webb Pierce introduces Stringbean -- Take Me Back To Tulsa (Stringbean) -- It's Been So Long (Webb Pierce) -- Closing statement (Webb Pierce) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Turner, Grant; Pierce, Webb, 1921-1991; Minnie Pearl; Locklin, Hank; Jackson, Tommy; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Kerr, Anita; Old Hickory Singers; Brasfield, Rod; Stringbean, 1915-1973
